Very expensive game if you want to get all the Killers/Survivors and their accompanying perks. The grinding required to unlock content you've already paid for is almost crazy. There is of course always the Kill Your Friends game mode where you and 4 other friends can use any of the perks/items/addons in the game, but there's no reward for playing this mode. Sometimes I wait months or years for a game-fixing patch. Sometimes I hate this game. And yet I recommend.

Most of my playtime is waiting to find a game. The long wait really ruins the game's atmosphere. I usually have to wait between 5-10 min to get into a lobby and then 1/3 of the time the killer leaves the game. But when you get into a good game its fun. Runs fine on a 1050ti 4gb

I poured quite a bit of time into this game's Xbox version playing as a killer main and came to love the game so I picked it up again here on Steam after 2 years. From what I remember, matches were tense and felt like a good challenge of my abilities and choice in perks. I had fun and would occasionally have really good games while I continued to rank up. 

However I very quickly realized that the game has gone bad in multiple ways. The largest one is matchmaking, I hadn't even ranked or leveled up before I was playing against survivors in the 2nd highest rank range or had 4 perks available to them (compared to my 1 or 2). Continuing to play has only deepened this issue as I've had multiple games now where I'm placed against Rank 2 players (the second highest level out of 20). There is also an issue where dead survivors continue to grunt and scream as if they were alive which disrupts the game flow by making killers believe there's a nearby survivor when in reality they're on the other side of the map.

The game has a fundamental problem as well that is at best annoying and at worst pay to win. Each survivor/killer has 3 unique perks that can be used on other characters once you've reached a certain level with the original character. This is the "annoying" part of the problem because it locks good perks (or ones useful on other characters) behind ones that you might hate playing. Where this problem is at its worst is DLC characters. Most of the perks (as well as characters) in the game and every good one is locked behind a $5 paywall or a weekly random chance that requires a very hard to get currency from leveling up your overall profile. This means that if you want to have decent odds against the survivors/killers you're facing you will have to spend a lot of time and a good bit of money on characters you don't want just for the perks.

I used to love this game but I can't recommend it to new players as they will be left in the dust and forced to fend for themselves against those who have been playing for far longer and have spent more money.
this game is a field day for masochists.

Recomiendo si arreglan esto ya que Este juego fomenta a campear como asesino y de superviviente a desconectarse. Deberian de poner un modo solitario (Partida Online solo) y un modo Premade (Jugar con Amigos) poner en en reporte (jugar campeando) y en el modo "con amigos" enviar a los asesinos que son reportados por jugar a lo cerdo o "campeando" y en el modo solitario a los que juegan normal. Asi el juego seria mejor y tendria algo Equitativo.
